description: Angry ApeÂ® Creative is a design and marketing firm. Our goal is to help small to medium-sized businesses compete with their larger counterparts. We do this by helping with one-off design or marketing projects or becoming the whole or a part of your marketing department. We do logo/branding design, website design, social media management or set up, print design, digital design, photography, and videography.
